title: Ava
overview: A black ops assassin is forced to fight for her own survival after a job goes dangerously wrong.

title: Ava
overview: Ava, 13, is spending the summer on the Atlantic coast when she learns that she will lose her sight sooner than expected. Her mother decides to act as if everything were normal so as to spend their best summer ever. Ava confronts the problem in her own way. She steals a big black dog that belongs to a young man on the run...

title: Infrared Dreams
overview: In the not too distant future, a captive woman undergoes psychological and emotional testing by her abductor. As she tries to escape, she learns that he may not be her biggest concern.

title: Ava
overview: Ava and her best friend Devon push the boundaries of their relationship confronting the feelings for one another. Exposing herself to the truth, questions arise. Who is the real and true Ava and what path will she pursue with the help of her Astral Device?

title: Ava
overview: Trapped by the pandemic in the apartment where her blind grandfather used to live, Ava tries to create a new glass eye for him, exploring a variety of images, so he can “see” the world she now lives in. This video explores a journey of a character in her different possibilities of existence and fragmented pieces of new possible landscapes.

title: Ava
overview: After many years, Ava finds his terminally ill father who is one of the artists who suffered a mental breakdown in the eighties when the revolutionary extremists harassed artists and most of the art activities especially music were banned. Ava, an artist with a great voice, faces the same challenges as a woman.

title: Ava
overview: Ava's story that enters a park

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
overview: Set more than a decade after the events of the first film, learn the story of the Sully family (Jake, Neytiri, and their kids), the trouble that follows them, the lengths they go to keep each other safe, the battles they fight to stay alive, and the tragedies they endure.

title: Ava
overview: A young teenager escapes a gay conversion center to rescue her friend.

title: Ava
overview: Ava is hoping her 15th birthday will be a less bitter affair than her last few. Unfortunately for Ava, the universe has something else in mind.

title: AVA
overview: Ava taps into a parallel reality as they strip down their masquerade.

title: Avalanche of Love
overview: Romantic comedy takes place during a wedding day of a bride-to-be Alex, whose big day keeps falling apart. Her neurotic mother controls every step she makes, her step father investigates a non-existing crime and her biological father, a bohemian owner of the hotel where the wedding takes place, is responsible for a missing groom. Chaos in the hotel suits the charming ski instructor Peter who convinces an introverted hotel guest Klara to help him create the most beautiful dinner date ever.

title: Ava
overview: After the death of her best friend, Ava is thrown into her senior year of high school alone.

title: Ava
overview: Portrait of trans woman and drag artist Ava Mathey

title: Avatar
overview: In the 22nd century, a paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

original_title: Avatar: Creating the World of Pandora
title: Avatar: Creating the World of Pandora
overview: The Making-of James Cameron's Avatar. It shows interesting parts of the work on the set.

title: Avalon
overview: In a future world, young people are increasingly becoming addicted to an illegal (and potentially deadly) battle simulation game called Avalon. When Ash, a star player, hears of rumors that a more advanced level of the game exists somewhere, she gives up her loner ways and joins a gang of explorers. Even if she finds the gateway to the next level, will she ever be able to come back to reality?

title: The King's Avatar: For the Glory
overview: In this prequel to the animated series The King's Avatar, Ye Xiu enters into the pro gaming world of Glory, and competes in the first Pro League series tournament.
